title: I own the racecourse
creator_credit: Stephen Ramsey, Timothy Read, John Edwards and Bush Christmas Productions
brief_description: A heartwarming and humorous story from the novel by Patricia Wrightson. Set in Sydney, a backward child named Andy buys a racecourse for Three Dollars from a tramp.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Ramsey, Timothy Read, John Edwards and Bush Christmas Productions
